TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit Metafile extends System.Drawing.Image

Docs.summary: Defines a graphic metafile. A metafile contains records that describe a sequence of graphics operations that can be recorded (constructed) and played back (displayed). This class is not inheritable.

remarks.format:
## Remarks When you use the <xref:System.Drawing.Image.Save%2A> method to save a graphic image as a Windows Metafile Format (WMF) or Enhanced Metafile Format (EMF) file, the resulting file is saved as a Portable Network Graphics (PNG) file instead. This behavior occurs because the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] component of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] does not have an encoder that you can use to save files as .wmf or .emf files.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile> and use the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile.PlayRecord%2A> method.
[!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public Metafile (System.IO.Stream stream);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.IO.Stream stream) cil managed

Docs.param: The from which to create the new .
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class from the specified data stream.

MemberSignature.Value: public Metafile (string filename);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string filename) cil managed

Docs.param: A that represents the file name from which to create the new .
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class from the specified file name.
